name: FlashMint
overview:
FlashMint is leading provider or professional flash templates. They create a wide range of products starting with simple flash templates, XML based flash templates and up to CMS driven flash templates, flash components and flash shopping cart solutions. The template database is pretty huge, there are over 2000 nice templates presented in FlashMint collection and the add around 4 templates every week. The support is pretty friendly and fast and you can also order custom website design or template customization services.

The template prices vary depending on solution that you choose: from $50 for usual flash templates and to $210 for CMS driven websites. There’s template knowledge database and tutorials sections available so you can be sure you will be able to install your template absolutely on your own.

At the moment FlashMint system is being rebuilt from the usual flash templates provider into flash templates marketplace where talented authors can submit their work for review and become one of the members of FlashMint.com. The company is comparatively small so there’s personal approach to every thing.
